channel.title: Lifestyle on Nootícias
channel.description: Recent content in Lifestyle on Nootícias

item.title: Facebook Messenger's latest attempt to hijack your social life
item.description: LONDON — Facebook really wants you to hang out and talk about your feelings. But, does it want you to have those conversations anywhere else other than on Messenger? Probably not.

item.title: “Carta de amor ao México” será 1º filme da Pixar da Era Trump
item.description: Em tempos de crescente tensão xenofóbica nos Estados Unidos, o longa chegará aos cinemas cerca de 12 meses após a vitória de Donald Trump…

item.title: Artista chinês faz pinturas em coleção de recibos
item.description: Liu Zhifeng, que mora em Pequim, fez pinturas em recibos retratando a natureza da transação envolvida…

item.title: Calling Bridget Jones one of the most influential women of the past 70 years is problematic
item.description: LONDON — Bridget Jones is the hapless, chain-smoking singleton who made granny pants sexy, and introduced “fuckwits” into our vernacular. Is she also one of the most powerful women of the past 70 years? Yes, according to BBC’s 2016 Power List which listed her as one of seven women who’ve had the biggest impact on British women’s lives.

item.title: 5 plantas para decorar a casa que exigem pouco cuidado
item.description: Elas são aliadas da decoração e do bem-estar da casa…

item.title: Dayse vence primeira edição do Masterchef profissionais
item.description: Participante ouviu de colegas homens que era a competidora “menos perigosa” e também que deveria “varrer o chão”…

item.title: Tinder on TV is your new favourite party game
item.description: LONDON — Move aside Monopoly. And charades for that matter. The game everyone will be playing this party season is Tinder. Yes, Tinder.

item.title: How a pair of leather trousers reduced the government into a bunch of 'Mean Girls'
item.description: LONDON — Never mind Brexit and Britain’s economic future, it’s a pair of designer trousers worn by the UK Prime Minister Theresa May and the childish spat that followed that’s currently dominating headlines.

item.title: 17 séries curtinhas para maratonar na Netflix
item.description: Se você também ama séries, com certeza já está ligada na nova atualização da Netflix, que agora permitir assistir o que você quiser offline…

item.title: Com carroceria targa, nova Ferrari J50 terá apenas 10 unidades
item.description: Baseada na 488 GTB, novo modelo tem design exclusivo e teto removível de fibra de carbono…

item.title: What if 'Inception' was a feel-good holiday movie?
item.description: Awesomely bad (but actually good) holiday beards have infiltrated social media. For better or for worse, these curiously blinged out beards seem to be here to stay.

item.title: Os detalhes do primeiro hotel de gelo permanente do mundo

item.title: How to make sure your laptop isn't one of thousands left with the TSA this holiday season
item.description: With Thanksgiving just past us and Christmas still to come, we’re right in the heart of the holiday travel season, so it’s a good time to remind you to stop leaving your laptop at TSA airport checkpoints.

item.title: Ferreira Gullar é velado no saguão da Biblioteca Nacional
item.description: O velório continuará amanhã (5) na Academia Brasileira de Letras (ABL), de onde o corpo sairá por volta das 15 horas, para o mausoléu da ABL.

item.title: “Se me ama, me deixa ir em paz”, disse Gullar à esposa
item.description: “Se você me ama, não deixa fazerem nada comigo. Me deixe ir em paz. Eu quero ir em paz”, pediu o poeta à companheira.
